attributes.action: TV and internet providers should block BBC services to a home upon user request.
attributes.background: It's technically easy for providers to remove TV channels and to block internet services.  If a household blocks BBC channels and services at their own request and also does not use Freeview then there should be no requirement to pay the license fee.
